headline: Revvity Secures FDA Approval for Improved Automated Latent Tuberculosis Test
summary: WALTHAM, Mass., April 02, 2025--Revvity, Inc. (NYSE: RVTY), today announced that the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has approved the Auto-Pure 2400 liquid handling platform with the T-SPOT™.TB test. Initially launched outside the U.S. in 2024, this powerful combination allows laboratories to improve productivity while maintaining superior clinical performance in latent tuberculosis (TB) detection. This milestone marks a significant advancement in the fight against TB with a faster high-
